name: Driving 3D Sport Car in City
description:
Driving 3D Sport Car in City
Driving 3D Sports Car Town - a driving simulator Sport Kara in 3D city!
Manage super car in bolshoi and beautiful city!
Surprise your friends with your car!
Do you want to save a complete collection of sports cars?
To do this, you have to beat all the levels in the game!
Trips around the city and mines glasses! The longer the distance, the more points you get!
Do not forget to collect cans of gasoline!
Become the best racer in town!
Have a good trip!
Leave us feedback and evaluation and we will make our game even better! Thank you for playing our apps!
